familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president/director/chairman of Trump Marks GP Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.

Former partner Trump Marks Holding LP (F/K/A Trump Marks LP)., in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Trump Marks Holdings Lp (F/K/A Trump Marks Lp)

familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president of Trump Marks LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company holds a license deal with Elk Lighting Inc.
